comments.author: DR01D
comments.message: Great article. Found a misspelling in one sentence. Should be "rare" not "race". By combining two web fonts together in a single headline, the FOIT has created a race condition that alters the integrity of the content.

replies.author: zachleat
replies.message: Fair question! I did mean to use race condition there: https://en.wikipedia.org/wi...

replies.author: DR01D
replies.message: Holy smokes you were right! Time to learn a new term. 8-)
